mapper.insert: insert into EMP (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) values (#{empno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptno,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update EMP set ENAME = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{mgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HIREDATE = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SAL = #{sal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMM = #{comm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPTNO = #{deptno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where EMPNO = #{empno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO from EMP
